name: The Crush
description: Afraid of heights? Don't play this one. On the other hand, you're no whimp... check it out. This level uses the limitation removed after Doom 1.2 .... the 1024 units high maximum threshold. We've made a level that stacks 8000 units (about 64 stories high and you get to jump off the thing and nail your buddies in mid-air! Like most of our WADS, the better coordinated you are, the more "stuff" you'll get. Aim yourself to land on the "ammo islands" or scale the ledges on the outer walls to build up your arsenal.
